article.headline: Gardner-Webb 79, Coastal Carolina 74
article.story: CONWAY, S.C. -- Nate Blank scored 18 points, leading five Gardner-Webb players in double figures in a 79-74 win over Coastal Carolina on Wednesday night. Auryn MacMillan added 15, while Jonathan Moore and Aaron Linn scored 14 apiece for the Runnin' Bulldogs (10-10, 6-4 Big South Conference). Blank was also 4-for-6 from beyond the arc and Linn dished out six assists. Steven Sexton led the Chanticleers (9-12, 3-6) with 25 points and Joseph Harris notched a double-double, scoring 18 and grabbing 15 rebounds. Anthony Breeze added 14 points. Coastal Carolina led by three points at the break, but Gardner-Webb outscored the Chanticleers 46-38 in the second half to seal the victory. The Runnin' Bulldogs won the rebounding battle 39-34, and scored 19 second-chance points to Coastal Carolina's eight. Gardner-Webb also scored 17 points off 13 Chanticleers' turnovers.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
